stories.text:
When I go into interviews, I get questions like, what do you think about CQRS? Or let's talk about Graph Databases, etc. I'm not preparing for an interview, but I still want a 10,000 ft view of architecture trends in our industry (software architecture).

I'm looking for a concise reference that is sort of a glossary of trends in architecture, *-driven-design, data store use cases, etc.

Each of these topics are typically covered in an entire book.

But, I just want to grok each of these topics quickly.

Any website, book, or other centralized resource you can recommend?
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for a glossary of software architecture buzzwords and trends
